data.title: Crazy Love (Dominique Deruddere)
data.meta_description: Buy Crazy Love on DVD from the official Mondo Macabro store.
data.text:
Directed by: Dominique Deruddere

Country: Belgium, 1987

Color / 1.66:1 anamorphic widescreen

Language: Dutch audio with optional English subtitles

Running Time: 87 minutes + Extras

Other titles: L'amour est un chien de l'enfer / Love Is a Dog from Hell

Region: All (NTSC)

Note: This DVD is out of print

Oscar® nominated director Dominique Deruddere's film is a darkly disturbing fairtytale for adults. On its original US release, the film was championed by Madonna, Sean Penn and Godfather director Francis Ford Coppola. But it proved too controversial for mass acceptance and never got the recognition it deserved.

Now reappraised as one of the most under-rated films of the 1980s, Crazy Love makes its DVD debut in a stunning Hi Def transfer from the original negative, laden with extra features.

The film tells the story of a man's life through three crucial nights, spread over 20 years. From a love struck teenager to a down and out 30-something, we see him move from dreams to despair. How he changes his life in one final, transcendent act gives the film its title as well as providing us with one of the most unforgettable scenes in recent cinema history.

Special Features:

Brand new HD anamorphic transfer from the original vault elements

Crazy Love: The Archives - Making Of with exclusive footage of Charles Bukowski (33 mins)

Dominique Deruddere on Crazy Love (24 mins)

Crazy Love and Belgian Cinema (text essay)

Mondo Macabro previews

Cast:

Josse De Pauw, Geert Hunaerts, Michael Pas, Gene Bervoets, Amid Chakir, Florence Béliard, Karen van Parijs, Carmela Locantore, An Van Essche, Doriane Moretus.
